title: Technology-Pedagogical Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Science Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and general educational theory comprehension
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, involving pre-service teachers who are current professionals with intermediate-level science subject-matter expertise.

learning_goals: Learners enhance their competency in designing science lessons using technological tools by over 80%.
Learners develop and implement science teaching-learning activities integrating digital resources at least three times.
Learners improve their self-efficacy in technological-pedagogical integration by over 30% compared to pre-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
